page.title: 08HOWLISH VIEW (Part 2)
page.content: Occasionaly we have a sports day in the field. Last year I won the flat race. I won a mint. On the Royal Wedding Day we had a street party with sideshows and amusements. I had to go in the stocks and get wet sponges thrown at me. Also in the field we have a power generator. We always are careful to keep away from the generator. At night we have a bike race. I have only won once. Our houses were built about 100 years ago. I have lived in Howlish View all of my life. My Mam and Dad have lived there for 23 years. The bottom of the street is separate from the top. At the bottom the road is terrible. It is all rocky and bumpy. There are also a lot of puddles. At the gap, half way down the street lots of gangs gather. That's why I don't go out to play very often.
